Text: Awa nʼeti-wa gbo̩ me̩, O O̩jo̩, amata-wa ka ñw a,
uwe̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ fʼabo uche̩ichi ne dufu,
Todu i chʼugbada e-ma oñ ma ne̩ gbʼane̩ le̩ n,
Uwe̩ chʼOnu-mi O O̩jo̩-mi,
Lugbo we̩ oñ a akʼabo ku ma kobʼuwa e̩che̩ wane̩;
Todu i chʼo̩o̩do̩-mi oñ nake̩do̩no n,
E̩ muda fʼuwa jadu bʼabo ku ma chʼuwa o̩pe̩cha te̩ me̩,
A aje̩nyʼO̩jo̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
E̩ muda hi uwa tinyo̩ me̩, e̩ la je̩ ñw ukata-wa muchi,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw a mʼubi dagbʼabo ku ma kobʼuwa;
Uwe̩ ko wa jo̩ dab ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma kpaje̩,
E̩ kʼamone̩-we̩ ta ukpo̩ ukpo̩,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw a chʼoli ina ñw amekeji-wa,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw a mud e̩wñ kʼabo uche̩ ichi dute̩ akwaku,
Eju-mi kad ukata-mi ku ma chi gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
nʼoj omuko̩la e̩ne̩ ki abina, kʼi achʼakpabie̩,
E̩wñ-i du lewa bʼuwa ma,
E̩do̩-wa la dabi wʼubi n,
kʼuwe̩ fʼuwa che te̩ ugbo amogbemgbem,
Iche̩wñ kʼa gbenyo̩ odu O̩jo̩-wa,
O̩jo̩ ma atejane̩ e-le̩ n?
Ochochi, tod uwe̩ oñ ma ko wa kpa gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
Mʼolu ji! e̩wñ chi kʼe̩lolu, O Ondu?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼeju-we̩ maja?
Todu onugo-wa fʼoji dalo̩ tunyʼebutu;
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ chʼate̩ko wa!
